channel.description: Recent content in About on ewenme

item.title: About
item.description: Analyst / R Developer and data science hopeful in UK government, currently. I’m interested in sharing and supporting opinionated analysis, adventures in R and humane, ethical applications of machine learning. Otherwise, I’m a collector/selector of dusty records and a player/admirer of The Beautiful Game™ (football, Euro-style). Please also hit me up with killer veggie recipes.
